Name: Headrest
Description: A wooden headrest made in three pieces. It has an oval shaped base with the top centre raised up to form the beginning of a column. The shaft is smooth and circular in section, widening from top to bottom. The abacus and curve are as one piece, the abacus is really the top section of the shaft and is oval in section. The curve is wider in the centre than at the ends. The pieces are attached at the top and bottom of the shaft with tenons fitted into mortises in the base and curve.
